name: obsidian-ideatr
description: Fast idea capture with optional AI enhancement. Simple, focused, and effective.

scripts.deploy: node scripts/write-deploy-timestamp.js && npm run build && mkdir -p ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css deploy-timestamp.json ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ && ([ -d binaries ] && cp -r binaries ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ || true) && ([ -d tutorials ] && cp -r tutorials ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ || true)
scripts.deploy:debug: node scripts/write-deploy-timestamp.js && npm run build && mkdir -p ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css deploy-timestamp.json ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ && ([ -d binaries ] && cp -r binaries ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ || true) && ([ -d tutorials ] && cp -r tutorials ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ || true) && touch ~/Documents/Vault/.ideatr-debug
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run deploy
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Patrick A Regan <ideatr@paraphlabs.com>
